name: Doctor Dilly-Dally
description:
Doctor Dilly-Dally spends his days "practicing" medicine at the local hospital St. Negligence. 

Follow the "Not So Good" Doctor on one of his typical days in the life of a physician working in the employ of St. Negligence Hospital.  The day is sure to be full of negligence, malpractice and plenty of medical inaccuracies. 

More to follow soon.
